#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	int t,i;cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int a[3];
	for(i=0;i<3;i++)
	cin>>a[i];
	sort(a,a+3);
	if (a[2] > a[0]+a[1])
		cout << "Alice\n";
	else if ((a[1]+a[2]+a[0])%2 == 0)
		cout << "Bob\n";
	else 
		cout << "Alice\n";

	}
	return 0;
}
